pano_prompt: a person enters a grand medieval library, surrounded by towering bookshelves filled with ancient manuscripts and the flickering glow of candlelight.
a person stands by an old wooden table, carefully examining a large, open book filled with mysterious symbols and faded illustrations.
a person reaches for a dusty tome on a high shelf, their silhouette illuminated by a stained-glass window casting colorful light onto the stone floor.
a person sits in a worn leather chair near a crackling fireplace, lost in thought as they turn the pages of an ancient book, their surroundings filled with the quiet hum of knowledge.
